My Creative Process

All of my projects take time -- I view them like art that will be on display.

1

Discuss The Project

Discuss what the needs of the project are.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Think of ways to make the idea come to life.

3

UI/UX Planning

Brainstorm a user interface plan with designers, bring it to life.

4

Interaction

Review the project together and discuss what we should change if anything.
